messages.body:
Apple will reportedly ditch Intel chips in Macs as early as 2020 - The Verge

$AAPL $INTC https://www.theverge.com/circuitbreaker/2018/4/2/17189372/apple-intel-chip-processors-macs-date

links.title: Apple will reportedly ditch Intel chips in Macs as early as 2020
links.description: In a major shift that carries big implications for both companies, Apple will reportedly replace Intel's processors with the company's own chips in Mac computers as soon as 2020, according to a new report from Bloomberg . The changeover is likely to begin with laptops such as the 12-inch MacBook.

messages.body: $AAPL another straddle candidate but IV is over the roof
$TSLA $AAPL $MU $SPY $QQQ $XLK $SMH $AMZN after checking on my puts
$AAPL He needs to pull a rabbit out of his hat/etc. or we’ll be looking at a slow bleed for a while if the stock sentiment doesn’t change
$AAPL Now, Cook won’t want to increase the dividend—that won’t make his pockets fatter.  He gets bonused for increasing the stock price.
$AAPL Prepare for a slow, painful death of a maturing innovation-barren company paying an anemic dividend.
$AAPL Cook has jacked the prices of Apple computers.
$AAPL Worse, a school bd member of one of the best districts in the state just told me that schools are moving from AAPL to IBM, cuz
$AAPL that they sure as hell aren’t going to pay Apple or Samsung for the privilege of enduring the pain.
